title: How is using your subconscious mind working for you? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most people have no idea of what their subconscious mind is or are even aware that it exists. You are using your subconscious mind all the time. All your vital functions such as breathing, digesting, your cardiovascular system etc. are under subconscious control. Everyone is manipulating your subconscious mind, including you through your thinking process. So my best advice is that if you want to make your subconscious mind work for you, acquire some self-knowledge. Please read my book and learn how you can manipulate your subconscious mind and make yourself happy.
